mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PS_Students (NAME,grade, class, school_id, del_yn, insert_date, insert_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{grade}, #{sClass}, #{schoolId}, 'N', #{insertDate}, #{insertId});
mapper.select: SELECT *,(Select name from PS_School SL where S.school_id=SL.id AND del_yn='N') AS schoolName FROM PS_Students S WHERE S.ID = #{id} AND S.del_yn='N'
